Enjoativo
This game is a bruh moment. esports ready.

While being 3 years old this game is still a gem.

Outside of a toxic community I have nothing bad to say about this game.
It has recently had an entire engine overhaul. The dev's listen to the community and are constantly making improvements. (I know, those in the Nurse and HB nerf camp would disagree with that statement. Just deal with it.) They have a 5 year plan for the game which includes constant new content. I have played for roughly a year now and the have released numerous new killers and survivors. Each one with their own unique Perks and Powers. New aesthetics are also constantly being added. No such a thing has Pay to Win here. Even if you buy a survivor or killer so you can share their teachable perks you still have to grind to level 40 of 50.
While seemingly simple on the surface this game is extraordinarily complex because of the perk system. Find your ultimate build and wreak havoc on survivors or make that killer look like a ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥. The choice is yours with a near endless combination of perks.
That brings me to the one and only point I have to complain about the game. The community as I said earlier is very toxic. If you can't deal with some salt I'd pass this one over. But that's only if you're a Skin Flint. ;)

Constantly growing game, great to play with friends or play alone as a killer

If you are looking for a game that will actually scare the crap out of you and make you pause, sit back, and take a break, unfortunately, this is not that game. However, if you are looking for a game that will constantly keep you on the edge of your seat and screaming with intensity, this is DEFINITELY the game for you. There are jump scare moments, but nothing too psychologically horrifying. There isn't much of a "horrifying" aspect to it in all honesty. 

On the other hand, the gameplay is absolutely incredible. This is EASILY my favorite game at the moment, and I have invested much more $ into DLC for this game than I ever have for any other game. I plan on buying every single new killer that comes out.

Worth noting, the game is NOT pay to win. You can easily become very good at the game without spending another dime on DLC. You can eventually accumulate almost everything in the game through hard work and playtime, including most DLC characters and their unique perks. You also can be a very good player without and of the DLC perks and characters anyways. 

The game in and of itself is absolutely fantastic, with an incredible DEV team that listens to its community and implements ideas from the players.

I HIGHLY recommend this game, at well above full price. So if you see it on sale, BUY BUY BUY!!!
nagyon zsir

Sigh. Yes, I like this game. It's broken, buggy, and full of really toxic people. But do I still play it? Yep. It's very addicting. I tend to keep a very positive mind set and I don't let people's words get to me. Honestly, watching players get so mad they yell school yard insults is always entertaining. Do I recommend this game? Not really. Would it be hypocritical because I spend so much of my life playing it to not do so? Probably. So sure, buy it when it's on sale. Get some DLC if you like it enough. I don't think it will ever be a perfect game. So don't set your hopes on it getting better or less buggy. Find the fun where you can and enjoy yourself.

一款不错的游戏，最近也优化了匹配机制，虽然BUG还是不少，但明显比前两年少了（尤其是回档BUG）。总的来说推荐入手，无论是开黑还是独狼都有不错的体验。

2020年后，修复了一个可以进入游戏的BUG，借此机会改为差评。

I was hesitant to first pick up this amazing horror co-op game. And I don't know what was holding me back. 
It is fun, slightly random, the occasional grief killer, and yet I find my self coming back for more. 

The developers are continuing strong and constantly updating the game. And affordable dlc... that doesn't happen often anymore.
Give this game a try... with friends for the best experience.

It's a fun way to spend some time, even for a beginner. The atmosphere is great, and I think this is improved by the fact that the game ensures you really, really have to focus on your environment or risk dying quickly (if you're playing survivor). Do use earphones and focus on sounds, as it can make a huge difference. I've encountered surprisingly few glitches, so nothing to say there. I also like being able to see DLC characters in action even if I don't own the related DLC just yet. Unfortunately I can't say much about the community, as my experiences so far have been limited and just mixed enough that I can't form a proper opinion. My one grievance is that, due to the way the game is structured, queues are really long if trying to play as the killer, and that also limits the amount of experience one can earn (and I don't mean bloodpoints here, but actual experience). For this reason the first few games as the killer can feel a little frustrating and demotivating. Either way, for now I'm enjoying the ride.

还行
------------------------------------分割线---------------------------------
                                          2019/12 
玩的人少了很多很多很多，肯定是因为直播被封禁的原因了。
20-16段位的屠夫排一把需要等待将近半小时，而屠夫上分很困难，奖章机制非常不合理。
PS：杀机距离发售已经有三个年头了，娱乐模式与排位模式至今未出现，这也是我想打差评的主要原因。明明游戏里已经有 玩家等级 这个东西了，根据游戏等级来进行娱乐模式的匹配很难么？又不需要移除原本的分段。而且在娱乐模式可以享受全技能全附加品，这样子在直播还未被封禁的时候可以吸引更多的玩家。可惜三年过去了，禁播也一两年了，厂商依然什么都没学到。
PPS：新的屠夫段位上不去，老的屠夫退坑。这样子就使得高段位（红紫段）的人类匹配时间过长，有的人选择不停拔线掉段去黄绿段鱼塘炸鱼，有的人等待时间过长选择退坑，这样子这游戏迟早玩完（其实现在也不火，日本除外）。不过话又说回来，恐怖游戏里面杀机算是比较火的游戏了，毕竟十三号星期五刚出来就凉了，杀机活到了现在。
PPPS:这款游戏即使热度不高了，依然有很多素质低下的玩家，毕竟这款游戏本质还是一个杀人游戏，有一部分人就是为了嘲讽别人而玩这款游戏的，或者心情不好的时候打开游戏用顶配杀杀人鞭鞭尸，来回翻板嘲讽屠夫。
PPPPS:想起这款游戏的网络问题，也是劝退低分段玩家的一个噩梦。就是你在低分段打屠夫需要排20+分钟，然后你偶尔会出现各种奇怪的问题让你无法建立房间，于是你又要等20+分钟，这样子你就浪费了人生的40分钟。这样算下来从20段到12段（绿段位）你至少需要浪费人生中12个小时时间（前提是你每打一把都能上一颗豆，3*8=24颗豆达到绿段位）。但是这实际上是不可能的，因为玩的人少，所以你打到14-12段的时候就很有可能排到紫段位的（5-8段），所以四跑掉豆是常态。
再说到屠夫的强弱问题，这个也是一个差评点，但是需要和我上述说的所联系，因为厂商至今未做娱乐模式以及单排与开黑分开的排位。杀机里的屠夫有的专门打单排，有的专门打车队，有的完全就是幻神。明明有这么多的屠夫，人类，以及数不清的技能，但是这款游戏却只有一个简单地”开始游戏“按钮。打个比方，你选择了小叮当，那么你就是一个纯走地的屠夫。你的优势在于找人，而劣势就是追人，因为你是个“纯走地”屠夫，当你打到紫段位遇到车队的时候你追人就会有人挡刀，砍一个人需要很久，因为你没有任何阻挡类技能。四跑简直是家常便饭。
（还有什么等想到再说吧）
2021/6/25：
